body:
Fix passing the python testsuite with spack install --test:

The distutils-C++ patch fixes missing support for CXXFLAGS and CPPFLAGS
for C++ compiles. This patch updates the distutils testsuite to expect
these additional flags to be passed to the C++ compiler and also covers
the other additions of the patch.
title: python: Update testsuite to pass with distutils-C++ patch
